ideas.title: Effect of Salary Transparency Laws on Wages and Gender Gap
ideas.rationale: Inherited from parent paper APEP-0146. Strong identification from staggered state adoption, novel policy intervention (job-posting transparency vs. weaker alternatives), clear theoretical predictions from Cullen & Pakzad-Hurson (2023).

summary: This is a revision of APEP-0146. The research idea was previously vetted and executed. This ranking reflects inherited scores.
